command: for i in $(seq 1 200); do nc -z -w3 release-name-netris-controller-web-service-backend 80 && exit 0 || sleep 3; done; exit 1

if [[ -f "${MARIADB_ROOT_PASSWORD_FILE:-}" ]]; then
    password_aux=$(cat "$MARIADB_ROOT_PASSWORD_FILE")
fi
mysqladmin status -uroot -p"${password_aux}"
